## ðŸš€ Basic configuration

1.  **Install Node.js**

    https://nodejs.org/

2.  **Create a Gatsby site.**

    ```shell
    # create a new Gatsby site using the default starter
    gatsby new my-project-name
    ```

3.  **Start developing.**

    Navigate into your new siteâ€™s directory and start it up.

    ```shell
    cd my-project-name/
    gatsby develop
    ```
